sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <!--Application Bar-->
    <AppBar></AppBar>
    <!------------------->
    <v-main>
      <router-view />
    </v-main>
    <v-footer class="text-center d-flex flex-column mt-8" elevation="6">
      <FooterContent></FooterContent>
    </v-footer>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import AppBar from "@/components/AppBar.vue";
import FooterContent from "@/components/Footer.vue";
import { mapActions } from "vuex";
import store from "@/store";

export default {
  name: "App",
  components: {
    AppBar,
    FooterContent,
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapActions(["updateUser"]),
  },
  created() {
    store.dispatch("updateUser", {
      user: this.$cookies.get("user"),
      isAuthenticated: this.$cookies.get("isAuthenticated"),
    });
  },
};
</script>
